front.title: Guidelines on the cryptographic algorithms, accompanying the usage of standards GOST R 34.10-2012 and GOST R 34.11-2012

abstract.t: The usage of cryptographic algorithms, that are defined by GOST R 34.10-2012 [GOST3410-2012] and GOST R 34.11-2012 [GOST3411-2012] standards, for protection of the information is carried out, as a rule, within the cryptographic protocols based on the accompanying algorithms. This memo contains a description of the accompanying algorithms for defining the pseudorandom functions, the key derivation functions, the key agreement protocols based on the Diffie-Hellman algorithm and the keying material export algorithms.
